accountID.description: optional. Account ID as defined in Orion.Accounts. Recommended to always specify this parameter. Advanced usage: omit this parameter to create an un-assigned Limitation, as such it will only be used if explicitly specified using "WITH LIMITATION ID" SWQL expression.

selection.description: required if Limitation is of type "Selection" as defined in Orion.LimitationTypes. A string that will be used to match one value against the Table & Field defined by corresponding Orion.LimitationType.

checkboxItems.description: required if Limitation is of type "Checkbox" as defined in Orion.LimitationTypes. An array of strings used to match multiple values against the Table & Field defined by corresponding Orion.LimitationType.

pattern.description: required if Limitation is of type "Pattern" as defined in Orion.LimitationTypes. A string that will be used to match multiple values as a text search pattern against the Table & Field defined by corresponding Orion.LimitationType.

account.description: User name to be added to Orion DB logins otherwise local machine will be added, if it is in domain

policyId.description: ID of the policy to export.

yaml.description: Imported policy in YAML format as a string.

entityUri.description: Uri of the target of assignment. For SCM policies it needs to be a Node.

policyId.description: ID of the policy to unassign.

entityUri.description: Uri of the target of assignment. For SCM policies it needs to be a Node.

policyId.description: ID of the policy to poll and evaluate.

entityUri.description: Uri of the target of assignment. For SCM policies it needs to be a Node.

unmanageTime.description: start time when transaction is not managed

remanageTime.description: end time when transaction is not managed

isRelative.description: indicates whether remanage time is relative to unmanage time

recordingId.description: Id of the recording to be run in transaction

agentId.description: Id of the agent that will run the transaction

Orion.APM.NodeToNodeLink.description: This entity aggregates all connections between two nodes.

ID.description: Unique integer identifier of link between nodes.

ChildNodeID.description: ID of node representing source of connection.

ParentNodeID.description: ID of node representing destination of connection.

Latency.description: Latency in ms between child and parent node.

PacketLoss.description: Packet loss between child and parent node.

LatencyStatus.description: Worst status of latency aggregated from Orion.APM.DependencyTCPStatistics.

PacketLossStatus.description: Worst status of packet loss aggregated from Orion.APM.DependencyTCPStatistics.

PacketLossStatusDescription.description: Verbal expression of packet loss status.

DetailsUrl.description: Url to Link Details Page where are details of the entity.

DisplayName.description: Caption of child node and parent node.

Orion.APM.DependencyTcpStatistics.description: This entity aggregates all connections between application/node and application/node.

DependencyID.description: The unique integer identified of ID in Orion.Dependencies.

NodeToNodeLinkID.description: Unique integer identified of ID in Orion.APM.NodeToNodeLink.

Latency.description: Latency in ms of the connection.

Status.description: The value indicating worst status of connections aggregated from Orion.APM.ApplicationTcpConnection.

LatencyStatus.description: Worst status of latency of connections aggregated from Orion.APM.ApplicationTcpConnection.

PacketLossStatus.description: Worst status of packet loss of connections aggregated from Orion.APM.ApplicationTcpConnection.

LastPoll.description: The value indicating last poll of the connection.

Image.description: Image what should be shown in UI.

LatencyStatusDescription.description: Verbal expression of worst latency status aggregated from Orion.APM.ApplicationTcpConnection.

PacketLossStatusDescription.description: Verbal expression of worst packet loss status aggregated from Orion.APM.ApplicationTcpConnection.

StatusLED.description: LED which should be displayed in the UI

DetailsUrl.description: URL where can be displayed details about the entity.

Orion.APM.ApplicationTcpConnection.description: This entity aggregates application connections from one process to another.

ID.description: The unique integer representation of database.

ParentDependencyID.description: The unique integer identified of ID in Orion.Dependencies.

ClientProcessName.description: The name of the process which is the source of the connection.

ClientCmdlineArgs.description: The process arguments of the process which is the source of the connection.

ClientServiceName.description: The service name for source of the connection.

ClientInterfaceID.description: The interface Id for source of the connection.

ClientComponentID.description: ID of component being monitored on client node.

ClientApplicationID.description: ID of application being monitored on client node.

ServerProcessName.description: The name of the process which is the destination of the connection.

ServerCmdlineArgs.description: The process arguments of the process which is the destination of the connection.

ServerServiceName.description: The service name for destination of the connection.

ServerInterfaceID.description: The interface Id for destination of the connection.

ServerComponentID.description: ID of component, except port based component, being monitored on server node.

ServerPortComponentID.description: ID of port based component being monitored on server node.

ServerApplicationID.description: ID of application being monitored on server node.

ServerPort.description: The port address of the connection.

ClientDescription.description: The description of the source of the connection.

ServerDescription.description: The description of the destination of the connection.

LastSeenTimeStamp.description: The time when was the connection seen last time.

Latency.description: Latency in ms for the connection.

Status.description: The value indicating status of the connection.

LatencyStatus.description: The value indicating latency status of the connection.

PacketLossStatus.description: The value indicating packet loss status of the connection.

LastStatisticPollTime.description: Last statistics poll time for latency and packetLoss

Image.description: Image what should be shown in UI.

PacketLossStatusDescription.description: Verbal expression of packet loss status.

StatusLED.description: LED which should be displayed in the UI

DetailsUrl.description: URL where can be displayed details about the entity.

DisplayName.description: Name of dependency with appropriate server port.

AgentId.description: The unique integer representation of agent

AgentGuid.description: The globally unique identifier representation of agent

NodeId.description: The unique integer representation of parent node.

Name.description: The string value that contains the name of the agent.

Hostname.description: Hostname of the server that this agent resides on.

DNSName.description: Full DNS name of the server that this agent resides on.

IP.description: IP Address of the server that this agent resides on.

OSVersion.description: Version of the operating system Linux agent binaries were built for; for a Windows Agent same as RuntimeOSVersion.

ConnectionStatus.description: An integer value which represents the current connection status of the agent to AMS

ConnectionStatusMessage.description: A human readable string description of the current connection status of the agent to AMS

ConnectionStatusTimestamp.description: Last time that the connection status was updated

AgentStatus.description: An integer value which represents the current agent status

AgentStatusMessage.description: A human readable string description of the current agent status

AgentStatusTimestamp.description: Last time that the agent status was updated

IsActiveAgent.description: A boolean value indicating if the agent is in active mode (Agent-initiated communication) as opposed to passive (Server-initiated communication)

Mode.description: A integer value with a value of 1 if the agent is in active mode (Agent-initiated communication), with a value of 2 if the agent is in passive (Server-initiated communication) mode or with a value of 0 if agent mode will be automatically detected during installation.

AgentVersion.description: Full version of the agent binaries.

AutoUpdateEnabled.description: A boolean value that indicates if this agent can be updated without user intervention

OrionIdColumn.description: Name of column/property with Agent ID. It's used internally by Orion.

PassiveAgentHostname.description: The hostname or IP address of the agent which AMS uses to connect to agent in passive mode.

PassiveAgentPort.description: The listening port of the agent which AMS uses to connect to agent in passive mode.

ProxyId.description: ID of the proxy through which Agent to AMS connection takes place through

RegisteredOn.description: Timestamp at which the agent was registered with AMS

SID.description: The Windows security identifier of the server that the agent is installed on, or a unique-like idendifier of the server in case of Linux system.

Is64Windows.description: A boolean value indicating if the operating system of the agent is 64 bit.

CPUArch.description: A string value indicating the architecture of the CPU of the agent server.

OSArch.description: A string value indicating the architecture of the operating system of the agent server.

OSType.description: A string value which is the type of the operating system

OSDistro.description: A string value indicating the Linux type of distribution.

ResponseTime.description: An integer value indicating in miliseconds how long it takes for a data message to go from AMS to Agent and back

Type.description: An integer value indicating the type. Currently not used and always 0.

RuntimeOSDistro.description: A string value indicating the Linux distribution, where the Agent runs.

RuntimeOSVersion.description: A string value indicating the OS version, where the Agent runs.

RuntimeOSLabel.description: A string value indicating a human readable operating system label, where the Agent runs.

OSLabel.description: A string value representing a human readable operating system label.

Orion.AgentManagement.AgentPlugin.description: A representation of the plugin on a particular agent.

AgentId.description: The ID of agent that this plugin is installed on

PluginId.description: A string which indicates the type of this plugin

Version.description: A string which is the version of this plugin

LastChange.description: Timestamp when plugin state changed last time

Status.description: An integer value indicating the status of the plugin

StatusMessage.description: A human readable string description of the current status of the plugin.

Orion.AgentManagement.Proxy.description: Proxy settings used in agent to AMS communications.

ProxyId.description: The unique integer representation of proxy

ProxyUrl.description: A string value with is the URL to the proxy server.

UseProxyAuthentication.description: A boolean value indicating whether proxy authentication is to be used.

ProxyCredentialId.description: ID of the Orion credentials to use for proxy authentication.

Orion.AIIM.Issues.description: This entity provides root information for an Orion Issue created by the AIIM BusinessLayer.

EngineId.description: Int32 that identifies the Polling engine that created the Issues.

CheckpointId.description: Int64 that identifies the latest snapshot for the Issue.

CheckpointDateTime.description: When the latest snapshot was taken.

StartDateTime.description: When the Issue was identified, and began

ClosedBy.description: The user id of the user that Closed the Issue.

EntityCount.description: Number of ManagedEntities involved in the Issue.

AlertCount.description: Number of Alerts involved in the Issue.

Orion.AIIM.IssueHistory.description: This entity provides the historical snapshots of Orion Issues, automatically taken while the issue is active.

CheckpointId.description: Int64 that identifies this snapshot for the Issue

StartDateTime.description: When the Issue was identified, and began

EntityCount.description: Number of ManagedEntities involved in the Issue.

AlertCount.description: Number of Alerts involved in the Issue.

Status.description: Status of the Issue when this snapshow was taken

Orion.AIIM.Occurrences.description: This entity provides a list of the event occurrences that contributed to this issue.

Id.description: Int64 Id identifies this unique occurrence of an event

Type.description: Type of Occurrence (Alert, Event, Configuration Change, Anomaly, Metric)

SourceOpid.description: A string that identifies the Entity for this occurrence

SourceId.description: A string that identifies the PerfStack metric for this occurrence

SubMetricId.description: A string that identifies the instance of Alert or Anomaly

OccurrenceCount.description: Number of Occurrences of this type (Alert, Event, Configuration Change, Anomaly, Metric)

IsPrimary.description: Was this a Primary occurrence when issue was created

PrimaryKeyName.description: Name of the primary key. used of faster access.

AlertObjectId.description: The AlertObjectId if occurrence is type of Alert

AnomalyHistoryId.description: The unique integer representation of the anomaly

TimeStampUtc.description: The date and time when row was added to the database

MeasurementTimeUtc.description: The date and time from the measurement history table

ValidUntilUtc.description: The date and time until the Anomaly is considered anomalous

MetricId.description: The string value representing Orion metric ID

MetricDisplayName.description: The string value that provided a human readable name for the metric

SourceOpid.description: The string value representing Orion Platform Identifier of the entity that owns this metric

SourceId.description: The integer value representing ID of the ManagedEntity that owns metric

SourceInstanceType.description: The string value representing the orion entity type of the source

SourceUri.description: The string is a SWIS uri, globally unique identifier for the source of this metric

SourceDisplayName.description: The display name of the source entity.

SourceDetailsUrl.description: The string that is a url to navigate to the details page.

SourceStatusIcon.description: The status of the source when the anomaly was detected

SourceIcon.description: Name of Icon that represents the source entity.

MetricValue.description: The double value representing the measured value that was anomalous

Units.description: The string value that is the units of measure for the metric value

AnomalyScore.description: The double value representing 0.0 - 1.0 of anomaly's P value (Z score in some cases)

Duration.description: The integer value representing total duration of anomaly. Increases as consecutive measurements of a metric continue to be anomalous

Orion.AIIM.AnomalyBasedAlertSources.description: This entity provides list of managed entities and metrics used in Anomaly Based Alerts.

AlertId.description: Unique Id of the alert configuration.

GroupId.description: The string value representing Orion Metric Group ID (System.StatisticsEntity)

SourceUri.description: Unique SWIS Uri for the source ManagedEntity.

MetricId.description: The string value representing Orion metric ID

Orion.AIIM.SourceStatus.description: This entity provides current status of anomaly detection for a specific ManagedEntity.

SourceUri.description: Unique SWIS Uri for the source ManagedEntity.

SourceOpid.description: Orion unique identifier for the source ManagedEntity.

SourceIcon.description: Name of Icon that represents the source entity.

SourceDetailsUrl.description: The string that is a url to navigate to the details page.

SourceInstanceType.description: The string value representing the orion entity type of the source.

Orion.AIIM.BasicMetricMetadata.description: This entity provides a list of Basic KPI Metrics, Thresholds and Entity Properties, this is a link table.

SourceInstanceType.description: The string value representing the orion entity type of the source

GroupId.description: The string value representing Orion Metric Group ID (System.StatisticsEntity)

MetricId.description: The string value representing Orion Metric ID (System.StatisticsEntity property name)

ThresholdName.description: The name of the threshold entity for this metric.

SourcePropertyName.description: The name of the property that has the current value of the Metrics.

DetectionLevel.description: The anomaly detection level for this metric.

Orion.AIIM.AiOpsMetricStatus.description: This entity saves metric status from AiOps service.

Id.description: The integer value representing ID of the metric status

SourceUri.description: The string is a SWIS uri, globally unique identifier for the source of this metric

MetricName.description: The string value representing Orion metric ID (including GroupId)

TimeStampUtc.description: The date and time when row was added to the database

MeasurementTimeUtc.description: The date and time when status was evaluated

EndTimeUtc.description: The time when record is replaced by newer record (used for simplifying UI calls)

Orion.AIIM.AnomalyBasedAlertSettings.description: This entity saves Anomaly Based Alerts settings.

Id.description: The integer value representing primary key of the settings record

OrionRegistrationTimestamp.description: The timestamp of configuration of Anomaly Based Alerts in Orion (a 'snapshot-timestamp')

UamsRegistrationTimestamp.description: The latest 'snapshot-timestamp' processed in AiOps service (in cloud)

Orion.AIIM.UsageStatistics.description: This entity provides a simple statistics about resource usage.

Id.description: Int32 that identifies this UsageStatistics

Key.description: The string value which represents this resource

Value.description: The integer value which represents the value of this resource

Preserve.description: The boolean value that specifies if the record is deleted during maintenance

ComponentID.description: Unique integer representation of parent component.

Key.description: Unique string representation of the setting.

Required.description: This property defines if setting is required.

ApplicationID.description: Unique integer representation of parent application.

Key.description: Unique string representation of the setting.

Required.description: This property defines if setting is required.

Cirrus.IgnoredNodes.description:
Nodes to be ignored during discovery.
        Creating, reading and deleting valid for Orion users with manage node permissions and at least WebViewer NCM role.

NCM.Baselines.description:
Multinode baselines.
        Reading valid for Orion users with at least WebViewer NCM role.
        Creating, updating and deleting valid for Orion administrators with at least WebViewer NCM role.

Id.description: Unique identifier and primary key of the baseline.

Name.description: Name of the baseline.

Description.description: More comments and description about the baseline.

ExactMatching.description: Indicates if the exact matching is enabled.

UseComparisonCriterias.description: Indicates if comparision criteria should be taken into consideration.

Disabled.description: Indicates if the baseline is disabled.

NCM.BaselineNodeMap.description:
Assignment of baselines to nodes.
        Reading valid for Orion users with at least WebViewer NCM role.
        Creating, updating and deleting valid for Orion administrators with at least WebViewer NCM role.

BaselineId.description: The baseline ID. Part of the primary key.

NodeId.description: The NCM node ID. Part of the primary key.

ConfigType.description: Config type. Part of the primary key.

CacheState.description:
The state of internal cache. Values:
        * 0 - Needs recalculation
        * 1 - Calculating now
        * 2 - Done and cached succesfully
        * 3 - Error

NCM.BaselineViolations.description:
Baseline violations latest data.
        Reading valid for Orion users with at least WebViewer NCM role. Read-only.

BaselineId.description: The baseline ID. Part of the primary key.

NodeId.description: The NCM node ID. Part of the primary key.

ConfigID.description: The baseline ID. Part of the primary key.

IsViolation.description: Indicates if the baseline is violated.

NCM.FirmwareOperations.description:
Firmware operations data.
        Reading valid for Orion users with at least WebViewer NCM role.
        Creating, updating and deleting valid for Orion administrators with at least WebViewer NCM role.

ID.description: Unique identifier and primary key of a firmware operation.

Name.description: Name of firmware operation.

CreationDate.description: Date and time marker indicating when firmware operation was created.

RunAt.description: Date and time marker indicating when firmware operation was previously run.

Status.description:
Status of firmware operation
Possible values:
* Unknown (0)
* Error (1)
* CollectingData (2)
* NeedsReview (3)
* Queued (4)
* Upgrading (5)
* Complete (6)
* Scheduled (7)

ErrorMessage.description: Error message when firmware operation has failed.

EmailSettings.description: Xml serialized object with email settings. Full type: SolarWinds.NCM.Contracts.InformationService.EmailSettings

DefinitionID.description: ID of firmware definition related to the operation

UserName.description: An Orion user who created a firmware operation

NCM.FirmwareOperationNodes.description:
Nodes associated with firmware operations.
        Reading valid for Orion users with at least WebViewer NCM role.
        Creating, updating and deleting valid for Orion administrators with at least WebViewer NCM role.

OperationID.description: Id of firmware operation node is associated with.

CoreNodeID.description: The Orion NodeID (int) of a node.

NodeOptionsXml.description: Xml serialized object with options related to this particular node. Full type: SolarWinds.NCM.Contracts.InformationService.UpgradeNodeOptions

IsComplete.description: True/false indicator if firmware operation has finished on this particular node.

NCM.FirmwareUpgradeImages.description:
Firmware upgrade images data.
        Reading valid for Orion users with at least WebViewer NCM role.
        Creating, updating and deleting valid for Orion administrators with at least WebViewer NCM role.

ID.description: Unique identifier of a firmware upgrade image and primary key.

FileName.description: Filename of a firmware upgrade image.

RelativePath.description: Relative path from used firmware storage path.

Description.description: Description of a firmware upgrade image.

CoreNodeID.description: The Orion NodeID (int) of a node to which upgrade this image was used.

DateTimeUtc.description: Date and time marker indicating when firmware upgrade was backuped.

MD5Hash.description: MD5 hash of a firmware upgrade image.

Size.description: Size of a firmware upgrade image.

NCM.FirmwareUpgradeMachineTypes.description:
Data indicating which images may be applicable for which machine types.
        Reading valid for Orion users with at least WebViewer NCM role.
        Creating, updating and deleting valid for Orion administrators with at least WebViewer NCM role.

MachineType.description: Machine type of nodes to which image may be applicable.

NCM.ConfigTypeVendors.description:
Data about available config type vendors.
        Valid for Orion manage node users with at least WebUploader NCM role.

Operation.description:
Vendor operation. Possible values:
        * 0 - EqualsTo
        * 1 - DifferentFrom

Cli.DeviceTemplates.description: Device templates. For valid Orion Platform users with manage node permissions.

AutoDetectType.description: The type of the auto detection used. 0 uses the system OID; 1 uses the system description.

Cli.DeviceTemplatesNodes.description:
Manually assign device templates to nodes.
Each node can have only one device template assigned.
When a device template is assigned manually, auto detection is not triggered.
For valid Orion Platform users with manage node permissions.

NodeId.description: Orion node ID. It's also the primary key and unique identifier for the assignment.

Cli.CliSessionSettings.description:
Settings used by the CLI component.
For valid Orion Platform users with manage node permissions.
Some settings:
* ConnectionTimeout - CLI connection timeout
* PromptTimeout - CLI prompt timeout
* SessionTracePath - Directory where session traces are stored
* SessionTraceEnabled - Indicates if session traces are enabled
* LoginAttemptsCount - Number of login attempts

SettingName.description: The setting name. It's also the primary key and unique identifier.

Orion.ESI.IncidentService.description: Holds the information about integrated incident management services.

Orion.HA.Pools.description: High Availability pools. Pool unites pool members of the same type to provide high availability of Orion servers.

PoolMasterMemberId.description: ID of pool member which acts as a pool master

PoolType.description: Type of pool (0 - main poller, 1 - additional poller)

PoolMasterChangeTimestamp.description: Timestamp of pool master role change

IntervalMemberDown.description: Interval after which is member considered as down

IntervalPoolTask.description: Pool task interval in seconds. In this interval HA service performs regular tasks e.g. services status monitoring

IntervalSuicideRule.description: Interval after which member releases its resource if it cannot reach other member of a pool do database

VirtualHostName.description: Virtual Host name assigned to a pool

VirtualIpAddress.description: Virtual IP Address assigned to a pool

DnsIpAddress.description: IP Address of DNS server hosting primary zone used by virtual host name

DnsZone.description: A name of forward lookup DNS zone where virtual host name record is stored

DnsType.description: Type of DNS server (Microsoft, BIND, Other)

Orion.HA.ResourcesInstances.description: Resources which belongs to pool members. Resource is a responsibility of Orion server which can be switched to another server in a pool e.g. "Main poller responsibility" or "Virtual IP".

PreferredStatus.description: Preferred status of member - the status HA service want resource to be

Orion.HA.PoolMemberInterfacesInfo.description: IP addresses present on interfaces of pool members.

IsDynamic.description: Static or dynamic IPv4 address flag (true - dynamic IP address).

Orion.Maps.ProjectHistory.description: This entity tracks the edit history for a Project.

Orion.Maps.GraphHistory.description: This entity tracks changes to the underlying graph for an Orion Map.

Orion.Maps.Projects.description:
This entity represents the view of a Orion Maps Project, that the user
      can store, reload or share with others, used in the development and display of a Diagram or Map.

Orion.Maps.Edges.description:
This entity represents the manual edges created from Orion Maps Editor between two managed entities.
      Each edge can also include Source/Destination metric entities (e.g. Interfaces) to show metrics associated with the edge.

Orion.Maps.Assets.description:
This entity represents the images uploaded by users using Maps editor. Each image asset can be used as the background image of the map, 
      or to represent the external entity connected by manual edge.

Orion.Maps.AssetUsage.description: This entity tracks the usage of assets in projects, allowing the system to remove unused assets.

Orion.NetPath.EndpointServicesBase.description: Contains configuration information for services to monitor.

Orion.NetPath.ProbesBase.description: Contains probe information. The probing is done from probes. A user can install multiple probes at various locations to probe the same service.

Orion.NetPath.EndpointServiceAssignments.description: Contains the assignments between probes and the services they monitor. A probe can monitor multiple services, and a service can be monitored by multiple probes.

Orion.NetPath.EndpointServiceProperties.description: Table holds settings for Probe and particular EndpointService if specified. Values are inherited from less specific (ProbeId only) to concrete (ProbeId and EndpointServiceId)

Orion.NetPath.Thresholds.description: Contains custom status threshold values for a probe and service assignment.

Orion.NetPath.Networks.description: Contains BGP information about the nodes and endpoints discovered during probing. This includes the autonomous system the node belongs to, the network address block, and the contact information associated with it.

Orion.OLM.MessageSources.description:
Message sources are IP addresses from which Log Viewer received a message or event.
They can be licensed, unlicensed, unmonitored message sources and so on.

Message sources can be duplicated for various reasons: 
 * message sources per engine,
 * dynamically assigned IP addresses, 
 * ...

If there is more message sources with the same NodeID, they still count as one Orion node, see Orion.OLM.Nodes entity.

NodeID.description: Identifier of mapped Orion node. Can be empty if message source was not recognized. Such nodes are treated as Unmonitored.

EngineID.description: Identifier of an engine on which the message was received.

Caption.description: Caption of mapped node copied from node.

IPAddress.description: Primary IP address of mapped node.

MachineType.description: Machine type of mapped node copied from node.

Vendor.description: Vendor of mapped node copied from node.

Created.description: Date and time when first message was recevied from this IP address.

Status.description: License status of the message source.

Orion.OLM.LogProfile.description: Profiles used for configuring log file collection.

Name.description: Name of log profile.

Filepath.description: Filepath or mask to specify monitored files.

Orion.OLM.LogProfileAgentAssignment.description: Relation between log profiles and agents.

Orion.OLM.HealthIssues.description: Stores health information related to Log node, agent assigned to node and Log profile on that node.

ID.description: Identifier of message on agent and profile.

NodeID.description: Identifier of node the health info relates to.

LogProfileID.description: Identifier of log profile the health info relates to.

Severity.description: General categorization of the message based on level of importance (examples: warn, error).

Priority.description: The urgency of the message (greater number means more urgent).

Orion.ActionAssignmentProperties.description: Action properties per assignment to store values for shared actions

Orion.ActionSchedules.description: Cross-reference entity between Frequencies and Actions

Orion.APIPoller.ApiPoller.description: This entity presents Api Poller properties

ID.description: The unique integer representation of the Api Poller

Name.description: The string value representing name of the Api Poller

DisplayName.description: The string value representing displayed name of the Api Poller

TemplateId.description: The unique integer representation of the Api Poller template

LastPollTimestamp.description: The date and time of last poll of the Api Poller

RelatedEntityId.description: The unique integer representing the related entity

RelatedEntityType.description: The string value representing the related entity type

DetailsUrl.description: The string value representing details url of the Api Poller

Status.description: The integer representing status of the Api Poller

StatusDescription.description: The string value representing description of status of the Api Poller

StatusLED.description: The string value representing status LED of the Api Poller

Image.description: The string value representing image of the Api Poller

Description.description: The string value representing description of the Api Poller

Orion.APIPoller.PollingConfiguration.description: This entity presents Api Poller Polling Configuraton properties

ApiPollerId.description: The unique integer representation of the Api Poller

PollingInterval.description: The polling interval time in minutes between two consecutive polls

Orion.APIPoller.RequestDetails.description: This entity presents request details used by Api Poller

ID.description: The unique integer representation of the request details

ApiPollerId.description: The unique integer representation of the Api Poller

Url.description: The string value representing url of the request details

Body.description: The string value representing body of the request details

HttpVerb.description: The string value representing http verb of the request details

CredentialsId.description: The unique integer representation of the credentails

CredentialsType.description: The string value representing the credentails type

VerifySslCertificate.description: The boolean value representing the verification of ssl certificate

UseProxy.description: The boolean value representing the usage of proxy

RequestDetailsOrder.description: The integer value representing the order of the request details

RequestTimeout.description: The integer value representing the request timeout

Orion.APIPoller.RequestHeader.description: This entity presents request header used by Api Poller

ID.description: The unique integer representation of the request header

Name.description: The string value representing name of the request header

RequestDetailsId.description: The unique integer representation of the request details

Value.description: The string value representing value of the request header

Orion.APIPoller.RequestVariable.description: This entity presents request variable used by Api Poller

ID.description: The unique integer representation of the request variable

RequestDetailsId.description: The unique integer representation of the request details

Path.description: The string value representing path of the request variable

DisplayName.description: The string value representing display name of the request variable

Orion.APIPoller.ValueToMonitor.description: This entity presents value to monitor details used by Api Poller

ID.description: The unique integer representation of the value to monitor

RequestDetailsId.description: The unique integer representation of the request details

DisplayName.description: The string value representing displayed name of the value to monitor

Path.description: The string value representing path of the value to monitor

WarningThreshold.description: The double value representing warning threshold of the value to monitor

CriticalThreshold.description: The double value representing critical threshold of the value to monitor

ThresholdRule.description: The string value representing threshold rule of the value to monitor

Type.description: The string value representing type of the value to monitor

StringToNumberTransformationOtherValues.description: The double value representing string to number transformation of the value to monitor

DetailsUrl.description: The string value representing details url of the value to monitor

Status.description: The integer value representing status of the value to monitor

Metric.description: The string value representing metric of the value to monitor

StatusDescription.description: The string value representing status description of the value to monitor

StatusLED.description: The string value representing status LED of the value to monitor

Image.description: The string value representing image of the value to monitor

ApiPollerId.description: The unique integer representation of the Api Poller

Description.description: The string value representing description of the value to monitor

Orion.APIPoller.StringToNumberTransforma.description: This entity presents string to number transformation rule used by Api Poller

ID.description: The unique integer representation of the string to number transformation rule

Text.description: The string value representing text of the string to number transformation rule

Number.description: The integer value representing number of the string to number transformation rule

ValueToMonitorId.description: The unique integer value representing value to monitor

Orion.APIPoller.Templates.description: This entity presents template details used by API Poller

ID.description: The unique integer representation of the template

Guid.description: The unique GUID of the template

Name.description: The string value representing unique name of the template

Version.description: The integer value representing version number of the template

DisplayName.description: The string value representing the displayed name of the template

Description.description: The string value representing description of the template

Created.description: The date and time when template was created

Updated.description: The date and time when template was last modified

TemplateData.description: The xml data representing content of the template

RequestsCount.description: The integer value representing the number of the requests in the template

MetricsCount.description: The integer value representing the number of the metrics in the template

IsCustom.description: The bit value representing whether the template is customly created

Orion.Engines.description: This entity contains main poller and all additional pollers list.

Orion.EngineProperties.description: Property and their values for each engine.

Orion.WebUserSettings.description: There are important setting which belongs to Web Console and some user.

Orion.UserSettings.description: There are important setting which belongs to orion user and they are store per orion site.

Orion.Credential.description: Entity represents Orion Credential objects that are used in discovery and polling processes

Orion.CredentialRelation.description: Relation to Orion.Credential. Serve for reuse same credentials for different Entity type.

Orion.Web.ViewGroup.description: Defines web site view group types

Orion.Web.ResourceSetting.description: Defines web site resource default configuration

Orion.Web.ResourceUserSetting.description: Defines web site resource user configuration

Orion.Sites.description: Represents Sites to be used by SWIS(f) to fetch data from.

Orion.IdentityProviders.description: Defines settings of configured Single Sign-On identity providers.

Orion.Dependencies.description: This entity contains dependencies defined by user and generated automatically

Orion.DeletedAutoDependencies.description: This entity contains Auto Dependencies ignored by user

Orion.ResourceProperties.description: All properties of resources added to the Orion views.

Orion.Resources.description: All resources added to the Orion views.

Orion.WorldMap.PointLabel.description: Location name for World Map point.

Orion.ForecastMetrics.description: Global settings for forecasting entities (e.g. CPULoad). Global settings include global thresholds, UsePeakValue flag, etc.

Orion.ForecastCapacitySettings.description: Per NetObject settings for forecasting entities. These takes precedence over the global settings from ForecastMetrics.

Orion.MaintenancePlan.description: Plan defining maintenance schedule for entities being unmanaged.

Orion.MaintenancePlanAssignment.description: Defines entity which is included in maintenance plan.

Orion.Web.FavoriteResource.description: All resources marked as favorite by a user account.

Orion.Web.UserWebView.description: Represents relation between Users and WebViews.

Orion.PerfStack.Projects.description:
This entity represents the view of a Performance Analysis Project, that the user
      can store, reload or share with others.

Name.description: Name of the waiver.

ExpirationDate.description: Date until waiver is valid and applied.

CreatedBy.description: Name of user (AccountID) who created waiver.

LastModified.description: Date when waiver was modified last time. It can return NULL when waiver was not modified.

LastModifiedBy.description: Name of user (AccountID) who modified waiver last time. It can return NULL when waiver was not modified.

OriginalStatuses.description: List of comma separated statuses of rule when waiver is applied. Options are: 0 (unknown), 2 (failed).

OriginalStatusesNames.description: List of comma separated localized names of statuses of rule when waiver is applied.

Orion.PolicyEngine.AssignedRuleWaiver.description: This entity represents a waiver for one rule and one entity assignment.

RuleID.description: ID of the rule this assignment is part of.

EntityName.description: Name of target entity. SCM uses only "Orion.Nodes".

EntityIDs.description: IDs of the target entity separated by underscore. SCM uses only NodeID.

Orion.Remoting.RemoteExecutionPackage.description: Enityt stores packages that can be executed remotely on given node.

RemoteExecutableId.description: The unique integer representation of a package

Orion.SamAppOptics.ApmService.Configurat.description: This entity contains configuration to connect with AppOptics portal.

Id.description: Each Settings has this unique integer representation

Orion.SamAppOptics.ApmService.ServiceHos.description: This entity contains informations about Service Host.

Id.description: Each Service Host has this unique integer representation

ExternalId.description: Id of service in external system.

Name.description: Name of host

Orion.SamAppOptics.Integration.description: This entity contains informations about AppOptics integrations.

Id.description: Each Integraiton has this unique integer representation

ApplicationID.description: Id number of Application related with integration

NodeID.description: Id number of Node related with integration

FailureReason.description: It contains reason of failure when deployment failed

Orion.SamAppOptics.RegistrationCountry.description: This entity contains informations about countries.

Id.description: Each RegistrationCountry has this unique integer representation

Name.description: The name of country

Orion.SamAppOptics.RegistrationState.description: This entity contains informations about states of countries.

Id.description: Each RegistrationState has this unique integer representation

Name.description: The name of country

Orion.SamAppOptics.ApplicationPool.description: This entity contains informations about application pools of IIS integrations.

Id.description: Each ApplicationPool has this unique integer representation

IntegrationId.description: Id number of Integration related with AppOptics application pool

ApplicationPoolId.description: Id number of ApplicationPool related with AppOptics application pool

ConfigurationPoolName.description: Name of AppOptics for IIS pool

Orion.SCM.Profiles.description: This entity represents profiles, which could be set and maintained by a user.

Name.description: Name of the profile.

BuiltIn.description: Boolean value indicating whether profile is built-in. This property is readonly and set to true only for profiles deployed with SCM installation. These can't be modified.

DisplayName.description: User friendly name of the profile. May differ from Name, e.g. if the Profile is managed by other module.

UniqueId.description: GUID of the profile, valuable for import/export to identify identical profiles across different environments.

TemplateMappingRules.description: Internal configuration storing how to discover profile and rules whether profile is candidate for monitoring (Json).

ProfileOrigin.description: Numeric value indicating where the profile comes from. Options are: 0 (New), 1 (Copied), 2 (Imported), 3 (ImportedFromThwack).

OriginalProfileUniqueID.description: Origin GUID of parent profile (when copied).

PolicyID.description: Identifier of Policy which caused creation of this entity.

Version.description: Version of the OOTB profile definition.

ManagedExternally.description: Flag, that the Profile is managed by other module and not SCM, e.g. PolicyEngine.

Orion.SCM.NodesProfiles.description: This entity represents mapping table for M:N relationship between SCM Nodes and SCM Profiles.

NodeID.description: Identifier of Node where the profile is assigned.

ProfileID.description: Identifier of the Profile which is assigned.

Orion.SCM.ProfileElements.description:
This entity represents monitored element for SCM profile, which could be set and maintained by a user.
      Monitored element can represent file or registry key which is monitored by superior profile.

ProfileID.description: Identifier of Profile to which this entity belongs to.

Type.description: Type of the element. Options are: 0 (Unknown), 1 (File), 2 (Registry), 4 (ParsedFile), 5 (SwisQuery), 6 (PowerShell), 8 (Script).

DisplayAlias.description: Alias assigned to this entity. If provided, it replaces automatically generated name.

Settings.description: All related settings specific for given type (Json).

Description.description: Text which helps understand this entity.

CredentialID.description: Contains credentialID for mapping with credential from Credential store.

UniqueId.description: GUID of the OOTB element, identifying it even if its name changes.

Orion.SCM.AssignedElementSettingOverride.description: This entity represents an overridden settings of an assigned SCM element. It allows to set the settings per Node.

NodeID.description: Identifier of Node where the profile is assigned.

ProfileID.description: Identifier of Profile to which this entity belongs to.

Settings.description: All related settings specific for given type (Json).

CredentialID.description: Contains credentialID for mapping with credential from Credential store.

Orion.SCM.Results.NodesPollingErrors.description: This entity represents polling errors for SCM node / server configuration. Contains only current errors, does not keep records of previous ones.

NodeID.description: Identifier of the node where error was collected.

Type.description: Type of the error. Options are: 0 (Agent not required), 1 (Agent Ok), 2 (Agent missing), 3 (Agent issue), 4 (Scm plugin issue), 5 (Scm plugin not responding), 6 (Scm plugin not applicable), 7 (Asset inventory missing).

Orion.SCM.DismissedCandidates.description: This entity provides Agent and Profile candidates the user does not want to see in the Candidates for monitoring widget.

NodeID.description: Identifier of the Node which is candidate for monitoring.

ProfileID.description: Identifier of the Profile which is candidate for monitoring.

Orion.SCM.FimDisabledNodes.description: This entity contains explicit list of nodes where FIM is forcibly disabled.

NodeID.description: Identifier of the node where FIM is forcibly disabled.

Orion.SCM.ProfileElementPolicyDataSource.description: This entity represents a Profile Element relation to PolicyEngine.

Orion.SEUM.Agents.description: This entity represents the Agent information.

AgentId.description: The unique integer representation of agent.

Name.description: The string value that contains the name of the agent.

Hostname.description: The string value that contains agent hostname.

DNSName.description: The string value that contains agent DNS name.

IP.description: The string value that contains agent IP.

OSVersion.description: The string value that contains agent OS version.

Password.description: The string value that contains agent password.

Url.description: The string value that contains agent url.

Port.description: The integer value that contains port.

UseProxy.description: The bolean value that specifies if agent uses proxy.

ProxyUrl.description: The string value that contains agent proxy url.

UseProxyAuthentication.description: The bolean value that specifies if agent uses proxy authentication.

ProxyUserName.description: The string value that contains agent proxy user name.

ProxyPassword.description: The string value that contains agent proxy password.

PollingEngineId.description: The integer value that contains polling engine id.

JobId.description: The guid value that contains job id.

ConnectionStatus.description: The integer value that contains connection status.

ConnectionStatusMessage.description: The string value that contains agent connection status message.

AgentGuid.description: The guid value that contains agent guid identifier.

IsActiveAgent.description: The bolean value that specifies if agent is active.

AgentVersion.description: The string value that contains agent version.

LoadPercentage.description: The integer value that contains load percentage.

RDPEnabled.description: The bolean value that specifies if RDP is enabled.

OrionIdColumn.description: The string value that contains Orion column id.

Unmanaged.description: The bolean value that specifies if agent is unmanaged.

ConnectionStatusTimeStampUtc.description: The date value that contains connection status time stamp.

NumAllTransactions.description: The integer value that contains number of all transactions.

NumManagedTransactions.description: The integer value that contains number of managed transactions.

AvgLoadPercentageLast30min.description: The integer value that contains average load percentage from last 30 min.

AvgLoadPercentageLast60min.description: The integer value that contains average load percentage from last 60 min.

DetailsUrl.description: The string value that contains agent details url.

Orion.SEUM.Transactions.description: This entity represents the Transactions information.

TransactionId.description: The unique integer representation of transaction id.

RecordingId.description: The integer value that contains recording id.

AgentId.description: The unique integer representation of agent.

Name.description: The string value that contains transaction name.

Frequency.description: The integer value that contains transaction frequency.

JobId.description: The guid value that contains additional identifier.

LastDuration.description: The integer value that contains last duration.

LastDateTimeUtc.description: The datetime value that contains last time stamp.

LastPlayedUtc.description: The datetime value that contains last played.

WarningThreshold.description: The integer value that contains warning treshold.

CriticalThreshold.description: The integer value that contains critical treshold.

LastErrorMessage.description: The string value that contains transaction last error message.

OrionIdColumn.description: The string value that contains transaction Orion column id.

LastModificationUtc.description: The datetime value that contains last modification.

UnManaged.description: The bolean value that specifies if transaction is unmanaged.

IsEnabled.description: The bolean value that specifies if transaction is enabled.

DetailsUrl.description: The string value that contains transaction details url.

Orion.SEUM.TransactionCustomProperties.description: Allows to create, modify and delete custom properties for transactions.

Orion.SEUM.TransactionRunParameters.description: This entity represents the Response times information.

TransactionId.description: The integer value that contains transaction id.

Type.description: The integer value that contains type.

Key.description: The string value that contains transaction run parameter key.

Value.description: The string value that contains transaction run parameter value.

Orion.SEUM.TransactionSteps.description: This entity represents the Transaction steps information.

TransactionStepId.description: The unique integer representation of transaction step.

TransactionId.description: The unique integer representation of transaction.

RecordingId.description: The integer value that contains recording id.

StepId.description: The integer value that contains step id.

StepGuid.description: The guid value that contains additional identifier.

WarningThreshold.description: The integer value that contains warning treshold.

CriticalThreshold.description: The integer value that contains critical treshold.

OptimalThreshold.description: The integer value that contains optimal treshold.

LastDuration.description: The integer value that contains last duration.

LastErrorMessage.description: The string value that contains transaction step last error message.

LastDateTimeUtc.description: The datetime value that contains last duration.

LastPlayedUtc.description: The datetime value that contains last played.

ScreenshotId.description: The guid value that contains screenshot id.

ScreenshotDateTimeUtc.description: The datetime value that contains screenshot date time.

OrionIdColumn.description: The string value that contains transaction step Orion column id.

DetailsUrl.description: The string value that contains transaction details url.

Orion.SEUM.Settings.description: This entity represents the Settings information.

Name.description: The unique string value that contains setting name.

Value.description: The string value that contains setting name.

Orion.SEUM.Recordings.description: This entity represents the Recordings information.

RecordingId.description: The unique integer representation of recording.

Name.description: The string value that contains recording name.

Guid.description: The guid value that contains additional recording identifier.

CreationDateUtc.description: The datetime value that contains recording creation time.

LastUpdateUtc.description: The datetime value that contains recording last update time.

RequiresInteractiveSession.description: The bolean value that specifies if recording requires interactive session.

ProbeType.description: The integer value that contains probe type.

Version.description: Version of a recording. Determines if recording is supported.

Orion.SEUM.RecordingCustomProperties.description: Allows to create, modify and delete custom properties for recordings.

Orion.SEUM.RecordingAuthentications.description: This entity represents username and password credentials stored in the recording.

CredentialsId.description: The unique integer representation of a credential pair.

RecordingId.description: The unique integer representation of a recording.

Host.description: Domain name of the website that requires credentials.

UserName.description: The string value that contains username for authentication.

Password.description: The string value that contains password for authentication.

Orion.SEUM.RecordingCertificates.description: This entity represents the certificates information used within recording.

CertificateId.description: The unique integer representation of a certificate.

RecordingId.description: The unique integer representation of a recording.

CommonName.description: The string value that represents the certificate's common name.

Url.description: The string value that contains url of the webpage that issued the certificate.

Orion.SEUM.RecordingSteps.description: This entity represents the Recordings steps information.

RecordingId.description: The unique integer representation of recording.

StepId.description: The unique integer representation of recording step.

Name.description: The string value that contains recording step name.

Url.description: The string value that contains recording step url.

StepOrder.description: The integer value that contains recording step order.

Guid.description: The guid value that contains recording step additional identifier.

Description.description: The string value that contains recording step description.

PlaybackCommands.description: The string value that contains recording step playback commands.

WarningThreshold.description: The integer value that contains recording step warning treshold.

CriticalThreshold.description: The integer value that contains recording step critical treshold.

ControlActionId.description: The integer value that contains recording step control action id.
